job.title: Software Engineer - Frontend
job.description: Squarespace is seeking talented JavaScript engineers with strong design sensibilities and a desire to create interfaces that are a pleasure to usebrbrThe Frontend team at Squarespace is responsible for building one of the most advanced interfaces on the web With it our customers are able to easily create beautiful interactive websites and stores If you are a Frontend Engineer who strives to push the envelope with what is possible in a web browser we want to hear from you This role will report to the Product Engineering Team Lead in our New York City headquartersbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liDesign and build new features into the Squarespace interfaceli liCollaborate with other engineers and designers to deliver strong customerfocused experiencesli liKeep our product up to date with the latest frontend technologies such as React and ES2015li liPractice disciplined software engineering eg automated testing code reviews and writing beautiful pragmatic codeli liActively contribute to team and company standardsli brbrulstronguQualificationsbrustrongul liProficient in JavaScriptli liHave solid knowledge of the DOM HTML and CSS3li liHave experience with Single Page Application developmentli liKeep up to date with the newest technologiesli liDevelop features and create fulfilling user experiencesli liA strong understanding of and practical experience with web application developmentli liA sincere commitment to crafting readable and reliable codeli liBS or MS in Computer Science or related or equivalent industry experienceli li2 years of industry experience li brbrulstronguAbout SquarespacebrbrustrongSquarespace empowers people with creative ideas to succeed By blending elegant design and sophisticated
